suggest.jms/serializer: If you want to use JmsSerializer or JmsDeserializer
suggest.nikic/fast-route: If you want to use the default Router implementation
suggest.symfony/event-dispatcher: If you want to use the default event dispatcher
suggest.symfony/http-foundation: If you want to use the default Request and Responder implementations
suggest.symfony/yaml: If you want to support serialization of YML format
